@graph.name: Route4Me's Partner Program - Business Growth Solutions for Fleet Management - Route4Me
@graph.description: Partner with Route4Me to expand revenue into existing customers or attract new ones. Our route optimization platform helps save 10-25% on fleet operating costs while providing seamless integration with telematics vendors.
@graph.keywords: partner program, route optimization, fleet management, business growth, reseller partnership, referral partnership, telematics integration, mobile workforce, route planning, revenue expansion, customer retention, fleet operating costs, GPS integration, field service management

@graph.name: Route4Me Partner Program
@graph.description: Route4Me's Partner Program helps businesses expand revenue into existing customers and attract new ones. Our route planning and optimization platform saves customers 10-25% on fleet operating costs while providing seamless integration with nearly 40 telematics vendors. Partners can choose between our Reseller Program with recurring revenue and attractive margins or our Referral Program with one-time referral fees.

@graph.name: Become a Route4Me Partner
@graph.description: Contact Route4Me to learn more about our Partner Program options

@graph.name: Reseller Partner Benefits
@graph.value: Recurring revenue with attractive margins, Partner maintains the relationship and bills the customer directly, Route4Me provides hands-on training, Partner maintains support with optional support packages from Route4Me

@graph.name: Referral Partner Benefits
@graph.value: One-time net-new opportunity referral fee, Route4Me manages and bills the customer directly, Route4Me provides all support directly to the customer

@graph.name: Platform Integration
@graph.value: Integrated with nearly 40 telematics vendors, Seamless integration with GPS OBD devices, Mobile-first approach with almost 2 million downloads globally since 2009

@graph.name: Customer Savings
@graph.value: 10-25% savings on fleet operating costs, Reduced inbound support calls, Enhanced customer satisfaction with SMS alerting and driver tracking, Built-in field-service management capabilities
